data.comment: Cercle Brugge kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Zulte move into a 0-1 lead through a Tomas Chory header.
In the minute 30, Anthony Musaba is booked for the home team.
Goal! Zulte extend their lead to 0-2 through Gianni Bruno.
William Bianda (Zulte) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 43, Dino Hotic (Cercle Brugge) gets a yellow card.
The first half has been concluded at Jan Breydel Stadium.
It's Zulte with the kick-off after the break.
In the minute 46, Paul Clement is making the team's first substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Johanna Omolo replacing Franck Kanoute.
Bassem Srarfi (Zulte) has received a yellow card from Jonathan Lardot.
The home team have replaced Robbe Decostere with Giulian Biancone. This is the second substitution made today by Paul Clement.
In the minute 67, Goal! Ike Ugbo pulls one back for Cercle Brugge to make it 1-2.
Paul Clement (Cercle Brugge) is making a third substitution, with Leonardo da Silva Lopes replacing Kylian Hazard.
Daniel Opare is replacing Abdoulaye Sissako for Zulte at Jan Breydel Stadium.
In the minute 78, It's now 1-3 in Bruges as Gianni Bruno scores for Zulte.
Laurens De Bock is replacing Bassem Srarfi for Zulte at Jan Breydel Stadium.
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Tomas Chory has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 87, Francky Dury (Zulte) is making a third substitution, with Ibrahima Seck replacing Tomas Chory.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Giulian Biancone (Cercle Brugge) has received a first yellow card.
